headline: How The Equity Residential (EQR) Story Is Shifting As Analysts Revisit 2026 Expectations
summary: Equity Residential’s fair value estimate has been nudged from US$69.76 to US$70.00, reflecting a modest reset in where some analysts see the shares settling. This shift sits between bullish price targets in the low to mid US$70s and more cautious moves toward the high US$60s, capturing the current push and pull in apartment and REIT views. Read on to see what is driving this debate and how you can keep track of the evolving narrative around the stock. Analyst Price Targets don't always...
